name: Ship Repair and Maintenance
description: Comprehensive repair and maintenance services for all types of vessels to ensure smooth operation and optimal efficiency.

name: Bunker/Lube Oil Supply
description: Supply of bunker fuel and lubricating oil to meet the fueling needs of vessels.

name: Spare Parts Supply
description: Provision of genuine spare parts and components for various ship systems.

name: Export Services
description: Assistance with export procedures and logistics for shipping-related requirements.

name: Provision, Bonded Supply, and Stores Supply
description: Supply of provisions, bonded items, and general stores for vessel operations.

name: Deck, Crane, Hydraulic, Electrical, and Engine Repair
description: Repair and maintenance services for deck equipment, cranes, hydraulic systems, electrical systems, and engines.

name: Port Agency/Owner Protecting Agency (OPA)
description: Agency services for vessel owners including port agency and owner protecting agency.

name: Survey Services
description: Comprehensive survey services including damage assessment, cargo survey, joint survey, bunker survey, and draft survey.

name: Cleaning and Security Services
description: Cleaning services for vessels and security services to ensure safety onboard.

name: Crew Handling (sign-off/on)
description: Handling crew sign-off and sign-on procedures for vessel crew members.

name: Main Engine and Auxiliary Engine Services
description: Services related to main engines and auxiliary engines including repair and maintenance.

name: Hydraulic Pump and Scuba/Underwater Services (UWI/UWC)
description: Hydraulic pump services and underwater services including underwater inspection (UWI) and underwater welding/cutting (UWC).

name: Salvage Services (lost anchor/chain recovery)
description: Salvage services for recovering lost anchors and chains.

name: Export of Spare Parts (all ship types)
description: Export services for spare parts for all types of ships.

name: Chipping and Painting Services
description: Chipping and painting services for vessel hulls and structures.

name: Fender Supply
description: Supply of fenders for vessels to facilitate safe mooring and docking.
